attributes.action: Stop the use of a endoscope to check box or tube sections of the chassis members of classic cars.
attributes.additional_details: Some classic cars have that have chassis tubes as part of their chassis, is an integral part of the breaking system, therefore drilling a hole for an endoscope will undermine this system.

rejection.details: It would be helpful to potential signatories to an e-petition on this topic if it explained the circumstances in which an endoscope would be used.  Is this something that the Government requires?  If not, then ceasing to use endoscopes is not a matter for an e-petition.
